fields.title: Google Business Description
fields.content: Write a friendly and engaging Google Business Profile description for a [business type] in [business location]. Highlight what makes this [business type] unique and why customers should choose it.

fields.title: SEO Blog Outline
fields.content: Generate a detailed blog post outline about 'Top 10 Tips for Choosing a [service] in [business location].' Include an introduction, key points, and a call to action.

fields.title: Instagram Captions
fields.content: Write 5 creative Instagram captions for a [business type] promoting their latest [product or service]. Keep captions short, fun, and add emojis.

fields.title: Email Newsletter
fields.content: Draft a professional but approachable email newsletter for a [business type]. Announce a special offer or seasonal promotion. Keep the tone clear and engaging.

fields.title: Sales Page Headline
fields.content: Write 5 persuasive sales page headlines for a [business type] offering [service]. Headlines should be benefit-driven and customer-focused.

fields.title: Customer Engagement Questions
fields.content: Create 5 engaging questions that a [business type] could use on social media to start conversations with local customers.

fields.title: Advertising Copy
fields.content: Write a short and persuasive ad copy for a [business type] promoting their [service] in [business location]. Emphasize urgency or uniqueness.

fields.title: Facebook Ad Variations
fields.content: Generate 3 versions of a Facebook ad headline + body text for a [business type]. Each should target different customer motivations.

fields.title: Video Script
fields.content: Write a 60-second video script for a [business type] to introduce their services in [business location]. Keep it clear, friendly, and engaging.

fields.title: FAQ Prompts
fields.content: List 5 frequently asked questions (and short answers) that a [business type] might receive from customers in [business location].
